xidplus.stan_fit package¶

Submodules¶

Fit all three SPIRE maps using stan

xidplus.stan_fit.SPIRE.flux_prior_all_bands(SPIRE_250, SPIRE_350, SPIRE_500, chains=4, iter=1000)¶

Fit all three SPIRE maps using stan

xidplus.stan_fit.SPIRE.single_band(prior, chains=4, iter=1000)¶

xidplus.stan_fit.SPIRE_hier_stack.LBG_highz(prior, chains=4, iter=1000)¶
